text: Sayajigunj assembly constituency (સયાજીગંજ વિધાનસભા બેઠક) is one of the 182 assembly constituencies of Gujarat. It is located in Vadodara district. ==List of segments== This assembly seat represents the following segments, # Vadodara Taluka (Part) – Vadodara Municipal Corporation (Part) Ward No. – 7, 10, Undera (OG) 11, Karodiya (OG) 12. ==Total number of voters== http://ceo.gujarat.gov.in/download/PCAC.pdf {| class="wikitable" |- ! Election !! Polling Stations !! Male Voters !! Female Voters !! Others !! Total Voters |- | 2014 || 227 || 134348 || 124960 || 0 || 259308 |} ==Member of Legislative Assembly== *2007 - Jitendra Sukhadiya, Bharatiya Janata Party *2012 - Jitendra Sukhadiya, Bharatiya Janata Party *2017 - Jitendra Sukhadiya, Bharatiya Janata Party ==Election results== ===2012=== http://ceo.gujarat.gov.in/download/Detail_Report_AC2012.pdf ==See also== List of constituencies of Gujarat Legislative Assembly ==References== Category:Assembly constituencies of Gujarat Category:Vadodara district
title: Sayajigunj (Vidhan Sabha constituency)
